name: Pong PLUS (Chulama)
description:
You've heard of pong, right? This is the ultimate remake. Experience pong with your buddies (locally) with some fast-paced gameplay! Choose between 5 different themes to spice up your playing field. Compete with your siblings and see who becomes undefeated! The best part? You don't have to pay a single dime. 

So, will you challenge your friends and family in Pong PLUS?

DISCLAIMER: Be aware that this is not the final version of the game, and it will be receiving updates as consistently as possible.
